SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface InvenManageInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
InvenManageUI
public interface InvenManageInterface
This interface defines methods related to managing the inventory of medications. It includes functionality for viewing the inventory, handling stock levels, and managing individual medicines, including adding, deducting, and updating stock.

The methods in this interface are intended to be implemented by classes that provide functionality for managing the medication inventory, including stock management and alerts.

    • viewMedicationInven

      Displays the full medication inventory.

      Displays medications that are low in stock.

      Displays the entire inventory of medications.

    • chooseMedicine

      void chooseMedicine(Scanner sc, Role role)
      Allows the user to choose a medicine based on their role.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      role - The Role of the user selecting the medicine.

    • manageMedicine

      void manageMedicine(Scanner sc, Medicine medicine)
      Manages the details of a specific medicine in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      medicine - The Medicine to be managed.

    • addStock

      void addStock(Scanner sc, Medicine medicine)
      Adds stock to a specific medicine in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      medicine - The Medicine to which stock will be added.

    • deductStock

      void deductStock(Scanner sc, Medicine medicine)
      Deducts stock from a specific medicine in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      medicine - The Medicine from which stock will be deducted.

    • updateStock

      void updateStock(Scanner sc, Medicine medicine)
      Updates the stock level of a specific medicine in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      medicine - The Medicine whose stock will be updated.

    • updateLevelAlert

      void updateLevelAlert(Scanner sc, Medicine medicine)
      Updates the alert threshold for stock levels of a specific medicine.
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for reading user input.
      medicine - The Medicine for which the alert threshold is to be updated.
